attributes.action: You should not have to pay for the TV in hospital it is a basic human right
attributes.additional_details: You should not have to pay for the TV in hospital it is a basic human right. It is outrageous to expect individuals to pay for TV in hospital especially when they might already be paying for a T.V licence. It is especially unfair when prisoners get free TV!

rejection.details: Please see: Return free television to hospital patients
